//: Chef For the Squatter faction Kitchen.

responses.text: This place is nice, what's the story?
Heard anything about the outside world?

dynamic_line: Well, believe it or not we broke this place before the shit went down. We secured it against the pigs but when ..whatever happened, happened it was a godsend. Most of us were on the street until this place, We'd likely all be dead if it wasn't for this old warehouse.
I spend most my time inside, Luckily i can make magic with some canned goods and a bit of meat if the others can get it..

responses.text: Yea... It's probably for the best. It's hairy out there.

dynamic_line: You're probably best to ask the others about that, like i said, i don't spend much time outside.. Aside from the zed's I hear many of the survivors don't take well too ..whatever is happening to me.
